request.title: LAN VPN Interface Ethernet Parcel Schema
request.description: LAN VPN Interface Ethernet profile parcel schema for POST request

dhcpHelper.description: List of DHCP IPv4 helper addresses (min 1, max 8)

nat.description: enable Network Address Translation on this interface

udpTimeout.description: Set NAT UDP session timeout, in minutes

tcpTimeout.description: Set NAT TCP session timeout, in minutes

sourceIp.description: Source IP address to be translated

natIpv6.description: enable Network Address Translation ipv6 on this interface

timer.description: Timer interval for successive advertisements, in milliseconds
Timer interval for successive advertisements, in milliseconds

tlocPrefChange.description: Timer interval for successive advertisements, in milliseconds

tlocPrefChangeValue.description: Timer interval for successive advertisements, in milliseconds

enableSGTPropogation.description: Indicates that the interface is trustworthy for CTS

propogate.description: Enables the interface for CTS SGT authorization and forwarding

enableEnforcedPropogation.description: Enable/Disable SGT Enforcement on an interface

ipMtu.description: IP MTU for GigabitEthernet main <576..Interface MTU>, GigabitEthernet subinterface <576..9216>, Other Interfaces <576..2000> in bytes

tcpMss.description: TCP MSS on SYN packets, in bytes

arpTimeout.description: Timeout value for dynamically learned ARP entries, <0..2678400> seconds

xconnect.description: Extend remote TLOC over a GRE tunnel to a local LAN interface

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for LAN VPN Ethernet Interface profile parcel
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
